data.system_settings: iPhone X - iOS 11.4.1 Dev Beta 1, iPad Air (1st Gen.) - iOS 10.3.3
data.actual_result: App crashes when looking at reactions
data.expected_result: App is not supposed to crash when looking at reactions
data.short_description: App crashes when looking through list of reactions
data.steps_to_repro: - Hold down on a message - Press on the "Add Reaction" button - Scroll down the reaction list "very slowly" and for at least a minute (Also make sure you have Nitro)
